page.title: 09EDUCATION
page.content: I go to school in Matlock.There are{ {160}boys and girls in my school aged between{7}and{11.}There are five other schools in Matlock.Two of them have some pupils who board at the school. While I am at school I learn to read, write, do mathematics, draw, paint, dacce and skip, play games and generally find out about things.We have 3 playtimes each day.I like playtimes except when it rains.We can buy crisps during the morning playtime .They cost 13p. We have our dinner in the canteen and my favourite is fish-fingers and chips with cream eclairs for pudding. We often go out on a bus for a visit and we also go to other schools to play football, netball and cricket. I am friends with most people and the teachers are kind.They don't shout at us much at all.I hope to be a teacher.
